text: View photos Since Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt's engagement was announced last week, there has been so much buzz about the ring, the ring, the ring, which designer Robert Procop and Pitt collaborated on for over a year in order to get it just right. But long before we had ever heard of Brangelina, Pitt famously popped the question to his first wife, Jennifer Aniston, making us wonder how the two rings — both of which he helped create — stack up. [ Related : It's Official — Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie Are Engaged ] As we saw on Friday, Jolie's ring features a massive giant emerald - cut stone, set in platinum, with side stones that encircle her finger.
